National_City.Marina, San Diego:
The Marina district is a neighborhood in the southwest section of Downtown San Diego, California, U.S.


== Geography ==

The district is bordered to the north by the Columbia district, bordered to east/south-east by the Gaslamp Quarter, and is bordered to the south-west by the San Diego Marina.
This district used to be full of warehouses and vacant lots, but now it houses mid-rise and high-rise hotels, apartments, condominiums, medical offices and retail. Seaport Village and the San Diego Convention Center are located in this neighborhood.
